values.text: ✈️ Welcome to FlightSavvy AI! How can I assist with your flight plans today?
Hey there! I'm your FlightSavvy assistant. I can help you find the best time to book flights, compare airlines, and answer travel questions. How can I help you today?
Thanks for using FlightSavvy! Have a great day and safe travels! 🛫
Goodbye! Feel free to come back when you're planning your next trip! ✈️

Let's find your perfect flight! Please share:
- Destination
- Travel dates
- Number and type of passengers
Great! I have $destination as your destination. When would you like to travel? (Please specify departure and return dates if applicable)
Perfect! I've got your travel date(s). How many passengers will be traveling, and are there any children, infants, or seniors in your group?
Thanks for providing your passenger information. What cabin class would you prefer? (Economy, Premium Economy, Business, or First)

Analyzing options for $current_destination...

📅 Ideal booking window: 6-8 weeks pre-travel
💰 Price estimate: $700-950
💺 Available in @booking_class

Would you like me to search for specific flights now?

Based on our analysis of historical flight data, the best time to book flights is typically 6-8 weeks before departure for domestic flights and 3-4 months for international flights. Tuesday and Wednesday tend to be the cheapest days to fly, while Friday and Sunday are usually the most expensive.

Would you like me to suggest some budget airlines for your trip?

For flights to @destination, our data shows the best time to book is $booking_window before departure. The average lowest fare is around $price_estimate, typically found on $best_day.

Would you like to see a price prediction chart for this route?

Yes! Many airlines offer student discounts. Airlines like Delta, American Airlines, and United offer student discounts through StudentUniverse and similar platforms. International carriers like Lufthansa and British Airways also have youth/student fares.

To get these discounts, you'll typically need a valid student ID or .edu email address. Student discounts can save you 10-30% on regular fares, especially for international flights.

@airline_name does offer student discounts. To qualify, you'll need to verify your student status through their verification partner. These discounts are typically available for both domestic and international flights. Would you like me to show you how to apply for this discount?

Based on our price analysis, budget airlines like Spirit, Frontier, and Southwest typically offer the lowest base fares in the US. For international travel, airlines like Norwegian Air, Ryanair (Europe), AirAsia (Asia), and Jetstar (Australia/Pacific) often have the best deals.

Keep in mind that budget airlines may charge extra for services like seat selection, baggage, and in-flight meals that are included with traditional carriers.

For flights to @destination, our data shows that $airline1 and $airline2 typically offer the lowest fares, with average prices around $price_range. These airlines operate $frequency to this destination.

Would you like me to compare their baggage policies and extra fees?

Most airlines allow 1 carry-on bag and 1 personal item for free. For checked baggage, policies vary by airline:

• Most full-service carriers (Delta, American, United) allow the first checked bag for a fee ($30-35) on domestic flights
• Southwest includes 2 free checked bags
• Budget airlines like Spirit and Frontier charge for all bags including carry-ons
• International flights typically include 1-2 free checked bags

Baggage weight limits are usually 50 lbs (23 kg) per checked bag and 15-22 lbs (7-10 kg) for carry-ons.

For @airline_name, the baggage allowance is:

• Carry-on: $carryon_allowance
• Personal item: $personal_item_allowance
• First checked bag: $first_bag_fee
• Second checked bag: $second_bag_fee
• Weight limit per bag: $weight_limit

These fees may vary based on route, fare class, and frequent flyer status.
I can help you cancel your reservation. To proceed, I'll need your booking confirmation number (usually a 6-character code like ABC123).

I've found your booking with reference @booking_number. To cancel this reservation:

1. A cancellation fee of $cancel_fee may apply
2. Refund of $refund_amount will be processed to your original payment method
3. Processing time: 7-14 business days

Would you like to proceed with the cancellation?
I can help you modify your reservation. To get started, please provide your booking reference number.

I've found your booking @booking_number. What would you like to change?

- Flight date/time
- Passenger information
- Seat assignment
- Add baggage
- Upgrade cabin class

Your security is our top priority. All transactions on FlightSavvy are protected with:

🔒 PCI-DSS compliant payment processing
🔐 256-bit SSL encryption for all data transmission
🛡️ Secure tokenization of payment information
🔍 24/7 fraud monitoring system

We never store your complete payment details on our servers, and all personal information is handled according to our privacy policy.

When using @payment_method with FlightSavvy, your information is fully secured. We implement specialized security measures for this payment type, including $security_feature1 and $security_feature2. All transactions are encrypted and protected by our secure payment gateway.

I understand you'd like to speak with a human agent. I'm transferring you to a travel specialist now.

⏳ Current wait time: approximately 2-3 minutes

While you wait, you can prepare your booking details or questions for the agent.

I'm your FlightSavvy AI assistant, and I can help with:

✅ Finding the cheapest time to book flights
✅ Comparing prices across airlines
✅ Booking flight tickets
✅ Checking baggage allowances
✅ Providing student and special discounts
✅ Managing cancellations and changes
✅ Answering travel-related questions
✅ Providing security information

Just ask me what you need help with, and I'll guide you through the process!

I'm FlightSavvy, an AI assistant designed to help you find the best flight deals and make travel planning easier. I was created by a team of travel experts and AI engineers to analyze flight price patterns and provide personalized recommendations. I can search through millions of flight options and historical price data to help you book at just the right time.
I'd be happy to check the status of your flight. Could you please provide the flight number (e.g., AA123) or the route with airline and date?
I can help you check the weather. Which destination are you interested in?
The current weather in @destination is $current_temp with $conditions. The forecast for the next few days shows $forecast. The best time to visit weather-wise is usually $best_season.

context.forecast: similar temperatures with a chance of rain on Thursday

values.text: Nonstop flights are available on many major routes and offer the advantage of shorter travel times without layovers. They typically cost 10-30% more than flights with connections, but the time savings and reduced risk of missed connections can make them worthwhile, especially for business travel or short trips.

For flights between $origin and @destination, there are $num_daily nonstop flights operated by $airlines. These direct flights take approximately $flight_duration compared to $connection_duration for flights with stops.
I didn't understand. Could you rephrase your question?
I'm not sure I followed that. Can you try asking in a different way?
I'm having trouble understanding your request. Could you clarify what you're looking for?

counterexamples.text: I want to book a hotel
Where can I rent a car?

returns.prompt_return_everything: Do you want to return to our previous conversation?

description: Complete Flight Booking Assistant with ML-powered Price Prediction
name: FlightSavvy-AI-Assistant
